title: Betplay Group
author: Betplay Group
content: When you hop, prizes might drop! Betplay.io invites you to take part in Kalamba Game's Rabbit’s Heart Cash Drop Tournament. A 10-day campaign with an unlimited prize pool! Yes, you read it right, an event with unlimited prizes. The tournament will be played from February 1, 2023, to February 10, 2023.This is an event that will make you hop because of excitement!Tournament Schedule: 2/1 12:01 a.m. GMT+8 to 2/10 11:59 p.m. GMT+8 (10 Days)There is no minimum wager required for each spin. Cash drops occur at random. While playing the qualifying games, the more you wager, the greater your chances of winning are. You are eligible for as many prize drops as you want.The thrilling tourney can also be played in currencies such as USD, EUR, ARS, BRL, CAD, CHF, CNY, CZK, HKD, IDR, INR, KRW, KZT, MMK, MXN, MYR, NZD, PHP, PKR, PLN, RUB, THB, TND, TRY, UAH, UZS, VND, and TWD.For a chance to be listed among the winners, you can play the participating games such as Divine Gongs, 9 Blazing Cashpots Megaways, Blazing Bull 2: Mini-Max, Joker Fortune Blitz, Sadie Swift: Guns ‘n Glyphs, Age of Dragons, Firedrake's Fortune, Age of Ice Dragons, Blazing Bull, Mammoth Chase, Joker Max, Fruit Max: Cashlinez, Phat Cats Megaways & Joker Lanterns: Hit 'n Roll.The promotion panel in-game displays the Cash Drops award amounts. Prizes can be triggered by any purchased spin. Any winnings will be promptly sent as cash into the winning player's primary wallet. Use our live chat assistance to get in touch with us if you have any questions about the campaign.
